name: Bugmancer
description:
Bugmancer is a game where you control a squad of insects. The goal of the game is to take over other colonies as well as defeating the Queen insects. 

How to play:

Conquer bug squads in order to convert them to your squad.

Defeat the largest squad on the Map to win.

You lose if your Bugmancer Dies.

Controls:

Your squad follows your mouse.

Right Click to Spawn a new army from the one you beat in combat.

Credits:
